description:
Akane is on a rampage! Or at least, she would be, if it wasn’t for all that ennui. But one way or another, she needs to be stopped before she hurts someone. It’s up to Sae and Nanaka, but they aren’t alone – Micky appears to help!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Octopus, a Flash of Lightning, and Micky
タコと, 稲妻と, ミッキー先輩
